title: INFOWARRIOR  XP - The Mightiest Windows Operating System Ever !
description:
-------------------<  PROTOCOL22  >------------------------

=================   INFOWARRIOR-XP   =======================
 


        BECAUSE THERE IS A WAR ON FOR YOUR MIND !


============================================================


              <a href=" http://jonesreport.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://jonesreport.com</a>     


============================================================




Most of You have already come across many of the tweaked nlite
XP Versions by now - many of them are 'cut-down' versions or
have had  registry tweaked in some way - The result may
be good for individual use - But chances are they will cause
problems for many of the people who download and install them
as each individual uses a myriad of different software and
hardware.


This is Windows XP SP2 Original -- No Tweaks or Adjustments 
Only Additions.




This is A Fully functional XP - SP2 with Support for all 
Languages and Keyboards.


Fully Automated installation - You choose which partition to 
install to and that's it - The installer does the rest - 
No questions and no serial number to enter 
- have a cup of tea/coffee and relax.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

THE BEST PART - Included are Driver Packs which are unpacked 
during installation. During Windows setup all your hardware is
properly configured and drivers are found for all your equipment --
sound and graphics, monitor, webcam, Network and Wireless cards, 
Modems,TV Cards -  You Name It !
No more searching for drivers and installation Disks.
At the end of the Infowarriors-XP installation you will have all 
your hardware configured and working properly - No Headaches !! 

-------------------------------------------------------------------
 

Microsoft Genuine Advantage - You Can install all Windows updates.


Programs included :  Microsoft Office 2003 - Lite
		     Adobe Photoshop CS 3
